title: Telemetry Stream Metadata Schema (TSMS)
description: Defines the configuration and fidelity requirements for individual S-0x telemetry streams ingested by TSSM.

transport_protocol.description: Protocol used by the upstream source.

priority_level.description: Priority for processing and back-pressure allocation (1=highest).

latency_tolerance_ns.description: Maximum tolerable temporal skew/drift budget, in nanoseconds (ns). TSSM HPTA uses this for corrective action.

expected_frequency_hz.description: Nominal sampling rate of the stream, used for anomaly detection.

criticality_flags.description: Flags indicating regulatory or trust criticality (e.g., TIA_MANDATORY, OGT_BASELINE).
